text: the most important part of making a
great recipe sandwich is getting a great
piece of beef to roast you start out
with good meat you end up with a great
sandwich
for a cold roast beef sandwich I like a
top loin a top loin has a lot of flavor
but it still has really nice tender meat
when you want to season it preferably
the day before if you have time
salt pepper I like to add some garlic
and rosemary but you don't even need it
necessarily let it sit in the fridge
overnight and then the next day roast it
low and slow but keep it rare top loin
has a lot of fat on the top it's lean in
the center however it's pricey if you
want to have something that's almost as
good but a lot less expensive go for a
top round fat cap is delicious when this
is hot but for a cold sandwich not so
delicious and then you want to try to
cut it as thinly as possible so your
roast beef sandwich has to have good mix
of flavors and textures but you also
want to have something surprising
Rhian mango pickle so spicy and so good
what I like to do is I kind of get the
crust see you like that and then once
you get the crust it goes right through
and you don't swish it too much it's not
gonna fit in my mouth
that's good
